about_the_game:
Want to overthrow the sovereignty or work to stand with them? Decide for yourself in Elegos, an immersive first-person RPG where every action matters...

Designed with a flexible play system, you can forge a path through a world where complex political forces clash in any way you like. Take up arms, dabble in forbidden magic, pursue your enemies from the safety of the shadows, or try and talk yourself into the ranks of the nobles.



Elegos is set in Macedon, under the rulership of Alexander the Great and his vindictive mother Olympias. Intelligent mythological beings known as the Mytha live downtrodden and disenfranchised, used for their unique skills by those in power.

But there is disquiet among the Mytha, whispers of revolution. Tasked only with uncovering the mystery of your past while surviving to see the future, how your story entangles with Mytha and Man is up to you.



How you behave matters in Elegos, providing satisfying outcomes to the smallest of choices dictated by your playstyle. Want to make use of that sword? Get a whole different experience than someone who uses a silver tongue to get what they want.

With a rich cast of characters, from the imperious nobles and calculating Foedus to the unassuming Mytha, how you view the world of Macedon might easily be swayed. Befriend who you like, and make enemies of others. Who knows, maybe you’ll be able to change the role that someone else plays in this world of politics and magic?



Elegos is a world that copes with the player no matter what. From how you choose to navigate the world, to providing tools for accessible modding, Elegos is a game that is fun to play and fun to play with.

Using a unique progression system, you can have your own direct impact on the story of Elegos through the choices you make - conscious or otherwise - when playing the game. Perfect for replayability.



Delve into a world envisioned by a diverse team of artists, where Ancient Greece has a mythological twist. Inspired by classical Elegies, explore the blend of Greek and brutalist architecture where tragedy and hope exist in opposition.

Elegos is a world rich with stories and secrets, seek them out as much or as little as you wish.
